summary: Traduzione italiana\Italian Translation della mod Showers in Inns
descriptionHtml:
Questa Ã¨ la traduzione in italiano della mod Showers in Inns
Serve la mod originale che trovate a questo indirizzo.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35311/?]Showers in Inns
[/url]
Grazie a Jokerine per il suo lavoro.


This is just the translation into Italian of the splendid mod Showers in Inns
It requires the original mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35311/?]Showers in Inns
[/url]
All credits to Jokerine, endorse him.

Altre mie traduzioni:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56211/?]Dawn of Riften[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56963/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58131/?]Dawn of Solitude[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61557/?]Bathing in Skyrim[/url]

e altre ancora se cliccate sul mio nome.
